subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The American goalkeeper Brad Friedel of Aston Villa made a record 167th consecutive Premier League appearance in a 0-0 tie against Fulham. The 37-year-old Friedel, who started the streak in August 2004 with Blackburn, overtook the record set by Portsmouth’s David James in April. ¶Ali Hawkins scored in the 102nd minute Friday night as North Carolina defeated visiting Texas A&M, 2-1, in double overtime, in the quarterfinals of the N.C.A.A. women’s tournament. Stanford, Notre Dame and U.C.L.A., which beat Duke, 6-1, on Saturday, also advanced to the final four. (NYT) ¶Sverre Wegge Gundhus scored the winning goal as St. John’s defeated visiting California-Irvine, 3-2, to advance to the quarterfinals of the N.C.A.A. men’s tournament. The Red Storm will host Indiana on Dec. 5. redstorm (NYT).
